title: Hunted
description: Antonio Cain MacCathmhaoil never intended to be come a professor like his father, but life has a way of changing one's plans.After a tragic event he applied for and accepted a job at Bridgett's School for the Magical Arts.There he met Sandra Porter and knew she was his soul mate.She did not feel the same...She ran.Far...But she was then captured by the Witch Hunters...Then the hunters became the hunted.Antonio vowed to bring her home.But first he had to save her from those who hunted...
author: Katherine Rochholz
